title: Neighbours (the remix) - Raafat Ishak (Labrador #2)
abstract: The Screen Lounge component of The 2004 Show: New Visual Cultures
description: Labrador #2 follows on from Ocular Lab's original exhibition, Labrador, and is a collaborative experiment investigating what neighbourly relevance there is, if any, amongst its participants and the broader art community. It also takes a critical look at ACMI and NGV: Australia at Federation Square and these institutions' relationship - neighbourly, or otherwise.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1005948; Neighbours (the remix): 2004 New Visual Cultures; Active; 12 Feb 2004-08 Jun 2004
